content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":113161,"originalJapaneseLine":"ヌヌハラがぴゅーっと姿を消した数秒後――","translatedEnglishLine":"A few seconds after Nunuhara vanished in a flash――"},{"lineNumber":113162,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははは！　女の匂いーーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahaha! The scent of a womanーー!\""},{"lineNumber":113163,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しかも！　これはまだ俺が抱いてない女の匂い！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What's more! This is the scent of a woman I haven't embraced yet!\""},{"lineNumber":113164,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どこだどこだどこだーーー！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Where, where, where is sheーー!?\""},{"lineNumber":113165,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":113166,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おや？　女なんていないぞ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh? There's no woman here.\""},{"lineNumber":113167,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うーむ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm...\""},{"lineNumber":113168,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺様が女の匂いを掴み損なうとは……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That I, of all people, would fail to catch the scent of a woman...\""},{"lineNumber":113169,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うーーーーん？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmmm?\""},{"lineNumber":113170,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスは何度も首をかしげながら、","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance tilted his head repeatedly,"},{"lineNumber":113171,"originalJapaneseLine":"その場を離れていった。","translatedEnglishLine":"and left the spot."},{"lineNumber":113172,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":113173,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あぶなー……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That was close...\""},{"lineNumber":113174,"originalJapaneseLine":"　もう少しで出会ってしまうところだった」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I was just about to run into him.\""},{"lineNumber":113175,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ていうか、あんな近くに……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Or rather, he was that close...\""},{"lineNumber":113176,"originalJapaneseLine":"　がはっ、がはっ……気絶するかと思った……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gasp, gasp... I thought I might faint...\""},{"lineNumber":113177,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それにしても……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Even so...\""},{"lineNumber":113178,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ああっ、やっぱりランス様は素敵の極致……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, as I thought, Lord Rance is the pinnacle of charm...\""},{"lineNumber":113179,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほらほら、見てよ、あなた。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Look, look, you see,"},{"lineNumber":113180,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランス様の歩いた跡が光り輝いて、","translatedEnglishLine":"the path Lord Rance walked on shines brilliantly,"},{"lineNumber":113181,"originalJapaneseLine":"　空気は清浄なる香りをまといて漂うわ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"and the air is wrapped in a pure fragrance...\""},{"lineNumber":113182,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ……うはぁ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah... uhaa...\""},{"lineNumber":113183,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ありがとうございます」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Thank you very much.\""},{"lineNumber":113184,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":113185,"originalJapaneseLine":"「握手……してもらえないかな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Could I... have a handshake...?\""},{"lineNumber":113186,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああっ！　ごめんなさい！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah! Sorry!"},{"lineNumber":113187,"originalJapaneseLine":"　欲張った！　今、私欲張ったわね！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I was greedy! Just now, I was greedy!\""},{"lineNumber":113188,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いや！　こんな私を見ないで！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No! Don't look at someone like me!\""},{"lineNumber":113189,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うわーん！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Waaaah!\""},{"lineNumber":113190,"originalJapaneseLine":"何故か、ヌヌハラは逃げてしまった。","translatedEnglishLine":"For some reason, Nunuhara ran away."},{"lineNumber":113191,"originalJapaneseLine":"ストーカーの心理は複雑らしかった。","translatedEnglishLine":"The psychology of a stalker seemed complicated."},{"lineNumber":113192,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":113193,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ずず〜〜〜……」","translatedEnglishLine":"*slurp~~~~*"},{"lineNumber":113194,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぷはーっ、やはり茶は玉露に限るな！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Puhah, tea is definitely best when it's gyokuro!\""},{"lineNumber":113195,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい、そうですね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, that's right.\""},{"lineNumber":113196,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あのぉ〜、ランス様。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Um, Lord Rance."},{"lineNumber":113197,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私も飲んでもいいですか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"May I have some too?\""},{"lineNumber":113198,"originalJapaneseLine":"「駄目、お前は水のみ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, you only get to drink water.\""},{"lineNumber":113199,"originalJapaneseLine":"「くすん……私も飲みたいですぅ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Sniff... I want to drink it too...\""},{"lineNumber":113200,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははは、奴隷が茶なぞ百年早いわ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahaha, it's a hundred years too soon for a slave to drink tea like this!\""},{"lineNumber":113201,"originalJapaneseLine":"と、ランスとシィルが、","translatedEnglishLine":"Thus, Rance and Seere,"},{"lineNumber":113202,"originalJapaneseLine":"今までに百回はしていそうな会話をしている時――","translatedEnglishLine":"were having a conversation that must have happened a hundred times before――"},{"lineNumber":113203,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おひょひょひょ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh yoh yoh yoh...\""},{"lineNumber":113204,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほああっ！　ほああああああああああ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Whoaah! Whoaaaaaaaaaa!\""},{"lineNumber":113205,"originalJapaneseLine":"それをばっちり覗いているヌヌハラがいた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Nunuhara was there, secretly watching it all."},{"lineNumber":113206,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あら？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh?\""},{"lineNumber":113207,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なーんだ、あなたったらいたのね。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, so you were here after all."},{"lineNumber":113208,"originalJapaneseLine":"　見てたなら声をかけてよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"If you were watching, why didn't you say something?\""},{"lineNumber":113209,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私？　私はいつも通りストーキングの最中よ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Me? I'm just stalking as usual."},{"lineNumber":113210,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こうしてコソコソ隠れ潜んで、声を、会話を、","translatedEnglishLine":"Sneaking around like this, hiding, listening to voices, conversations,\"}]}  }  }  }  }  }  }  }  }  }  }  }  }  }  }  }  }  }  }  }  }  }  }  }  }  }  }  }  }  }  }  }  }  }  }  }  }  }  }  }  }  }  }  }  }  }  }  }  }  }  }  }  }  }  }  }  }  }  }  }  }  }  }  }"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヌヌハラがぴゅーっと姿を消した数秒後――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A few seconds after Nunuhara vanished in a flash――

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははは！　女の匂いーーー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahaha! The scent of a womanーー!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかも！　これはまだ俺が抱いてない女の匂い！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What's more! This is the scent of a woman I haven't embraced yet!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どこだどこだどこだーーー！？」
「おや？　女なんていないぞ？」
「うーむ……
俺様が女の匂いを掴み損なうとは……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That I, of all people, would fail to catch the scent of a woman..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うーーーーん？」
ランスは何度も首をかしげながら、
その場を離れていった。
「あぶなー……
もう少しで出会ってしまうところだった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I was just about to run into him."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ていうか、あんな近くに……
がはっ、がはっ……気絶するかと思った……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gasp, gasp... I thought I might faint..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それにしても……
ああっ、やっぱりランス様は素敵の極致……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, as I thought, Lord Rance is the pinnacle of charm..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほらほら、見てよ、あなた。
ランス様の歩いた跡が光り輝いて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the path Lord Rance walked on shines brilliantly,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 空気は清浄なる香りをまといて漂うわ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the air is wrapped in a pure fragrance..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ……うはぁ……」
「ありがとうございます」
「握手……してもらえないかな……」
「ああっ！　ごめんなさい！
欲張った！　今、私欲張ったわね！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was greedy! Just now, I was greedy!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや！　こんな私を見ないで！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No! Don't look at someone like me!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うわーん！」
何故か、ヌヌハラは逃げてしまった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For some reason, Nunuhara ran away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ストーカーの心理は複雑らしかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The psychology of a stalker seemed complicated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぷはーっ、やはり茶は玉露に限るな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Puhah, tea is definitely best when it's gyokuro!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい、そうですね」
「あのぉ〜、ランス様。
私も飲んでもいいですか？」
「駄目、お前は水のみ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, you only get to drink water."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くすん……私も飲みたいですぅ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Sniff... I want to drink it too..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははは、奴隷が茶なぞ百年早いわ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahaha, it's a hundred years too soon for a slave to drink tea like this!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と、ランスとシィルが、
今までに百回はしていそうな会話をしている時――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: were having a conversation that must have happened a hundred times before――

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おひょひょひょ……」
「ほああっ！　ほああああああああああ！」
それをばっちり覗いているヌヌハラがいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nunuhara was there, secretly watching it all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あら？」
「なーんだ、あなたったらいたのね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, so you were here after all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 見てたなら声をかけてよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you were watching, why didn't you say something?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私？　私はいつも通りストーキングの最中よ。
こうしてコソコソ隠れ潜んで、声を、会話を、

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヌヌハラがぴゅーっと姿を消した数秒後――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A few seconds after Nunuhara vanished in a flash――

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははは！　女の匂いーーー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahaha! The scent of a womanーー!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかも！　これはまだ俺が抱いてない女の匂い！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What's more! This is the scent of a woman I haven't embraced yet!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どこだどこだどこだーーー！？」
「おや？　女なんていないぞ？」
「うーむ……
俺様が女の匂いを掴み損なうとは……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That I, of all people, would fail to catch the scent of a woman..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うーーーーん？」
ランスは何度も首をかしげながら、
その場を離れていった。
「あぶなー……
もう少しで出会ってしまうところだった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I was just about to run into him."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ていうか、あんな近くに……
がはっ、がはっ……気絶するかと思った……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gasp, gasp... I thought I might faint..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それにしても……
ああっ、やっぱりランス様は素敵の極致……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, as I thought, Lord Rance is the pinnacle of charm..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほらほら、見てよ、あなた。
ランス様の歩いた跡が光り輝いて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the path Lord Rance walked on shines brilliantly,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 空気は清浄なる香りをまといて漂うわ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the air is wrapped in a pure fragrance..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ……うはぁ……」
「ありがとうございます」
「握手……してもらえないかな……」
「ああっ！　ごめんなさい！
欲張った！　今、私欲張ったわね！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was greedy! Just now, I was greedy!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや！　こんな私を見ないで！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No! Don't look at someone like me!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うわーん！」
何故か、ヌヌハラは逃げてしまった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For some reason, Nunuhara ran away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ストーカーの心理は複雑らしかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The psychology of a stalker seemed complicated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぷはーっ、やはり茶は玉露に限るな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Puhah, tea is definitely best when it's gyokuro!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい、そうですね」
「あのぉ〜、ランス様。
私も飲んでもいいですか？」
「駄目、お前は水のみ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, you only get to drink water."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くすん……私も飲みたいですぅ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Sniff... I want to drink it too..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははは、奴隷が茶なぞ百年早いわ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahaha, it's a hundred years too soon for a slave to drink tea like this!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と、ランスとシィルが、
今までに百回はしていそうな会話をしている時――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: were having a conversation that must have happened a hundred times before――

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おひょひょひょ……」
「ほああっ！　ほああああああああああ！」
それをばっちり覗いているヌヌハラがいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nunuhara was there, secretly watching it all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あら？」
「なーんだ、あなたったらいたのね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, so you were here after all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 見てたなら声をかけてよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you were watching, why didn't you say something?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私？　私はいつも通りストーキングの最中よ。
こうしてコソコソ隠れ潜んで、声を、会話を、
